thread.title: Manchester United, City and Arsenal all in talks with Monaco star Fabinho over summer move
thread.title_full: Manchester United, City and Arsenal all in talks with Monaco star Fabinho over summer move

author: gsweet
title: Manchester United, City and Arsenal all in talks with Monaco star Fabinho over summer move
text:
FAB THREE Manchester United, City and Arsenal all in talks with Monaco star Fabinho over summer move 
But Brazilian's dad, Joao Fabinho, reveals on French TV that the Brazilian ace has 'a soft spot for Manchester City' By GEOFF SWEET Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MONACO defender turned central midfielder Fabinho is wanted by Manchester United, Manchester City and Arsenal – and that’s official. 
The news comes straight from the horse’s mouth – well, almost – after the Brazilian’s father spilled the beans on French TV. EPA 4 Fabinho…will cost at least £20million 
And it seems the two Manchester clubs, especially City, are leading the race in what looks like becoming a £20million tug-of-war. 
Joao Fabinho told Jplus1 : “We have been in talks with Manchester United , Manchester City, Arsenal and approached by Barcelona. Times Newspapers Ltd Pep Guardiola…could be favourite to land the Brazilian Watch all the Premier League action from Saturday in our Daily Round-Up 
"We like Manchester United and Mourinho’s work, but we have a soft spot for Manchester City.” 
The 'soft spot' would indicate that Fabinho would welcome an opportunity to work with Pep Guardiola, at The Etihad. r CREME DE LA PREM Burnley's Sean Dyche and Chelsea's Antonio Conte are best bosses in the Prem, claims Martin Keown GIMME MOUR LOVE Jose Mourinho claims he doesn't get the credit he deserves because of his style of play while at Chelsea 'I DON'T KNOW WHAT WILL HAPPEN' Pep admits Sergio Aguero could leave City in summer, and may be benched again tonight Red faces Liverpool bosses vetoed deal to sign Virgil van Dijk for fraction of £50million price-tag, says Brendan Rodgers 'I still scored more' Chelsea striker Michy Batshuayi brutally trolls West Ham fans over Zaza comparison PRICE IS RIGHT West Ham 'to follow Man United and freeze season ticket prices' after poor first year at London Stadium 
Last summer Fabinho was heavily linked with United . Since then the 23-year-old right back has filled in for Monaco in central midfield - and that could be where his future lies. 
City will a take look at Fabinho at close hand when they play Monaco in the knockout rounds of the Champions League later this month. 
Fabinho joined Monaco on loan in 2013 and spent two consecutive season on loan with the French side before joining them for £5.1m in 2015. EPA Fabinho has five goals for Monaco this season Getty Images 4 The Brazilian has switched from right-back to midfield The defender had previously spent a season on loan at Real Madrid playing for their Castilla side and then another season on loan with the senior team, where he made one appearance. 
This season he has made 24 appearances for Monaco in Ligue 1 and has picked up five goals and an assist. Watch all the Premier League action from Sunday in our Daily Round-Up 
He has been a key part of Leonardo Jardim’s side as they look to end PSG’s dominance in the French league. Fabinho has played four times Brazil, always at right-back..
